items.title: Portfolio
items.description: That website. It's a project developed in Javascript/React, with the goal is to present my differents projects.

items.title: Sataniawa Bot
items.description: A Discord bot, developed in Python. It doesn't really have any goal, if only an experimental creation for explore the different possibilities with a discord bot.

items.title: Multi-platform Diary
items.description: The objectiv of this project is to develop a diary, shared with multiple users, and usable at the same time on multiple platforms (pc/mobile). It is developed with a Java Springboot Backend, and an Angular Frontend.

items.title: Platformer 2D
items.description: A 2D platformer project made with Unity. The goal was to master the basics of the game engine.
